item.title: About
item.description:
# Zayn Lie (Zayn Wang/Zayn Wong)

My preferred name Zayn comes from the seventh Hebrew letter, concerning pronunciation and my interest in Set Theory, in which Aleph number $\aleph$ is the first Hebrew letter and Beth number $\beth$ is the second; and the seven as an natural number:

$$\begin{align*} {&\emptyset, \ &{\emptyset}, \ &{\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, \ &{\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}, \ &{\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}}, \ &{\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}}}, \ &{\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}, {\emptyset, {\emptyset}}}}}} \ } \end{align*} $$

is an interesting number.

My research interests are swifting with my understanding of math. In the high school, I was interested in the algorithms of computer science and starting to do some research of machine learning. But the black box of it disappointed me, then I was trying to think and unearth every unclear knowledge especially in math and cs. That lead me to read GÃ¶del’s incompleteness theorems, which fund the basis of my interests in Set Theory.

Currently, my research interests could be divided into three main parts:

  • Pure Analysis, Abstract Algebra, and Topology
  • Theoretical Computer Science, Formal Method and Verification
  • Set Theory, Computability and Completeness, and Logic with Axioms

# Account Profile

  • ORCID: Zayn Wang: 0009-0006-4133-8181
  • Google Scholar: Zayn Wang
  • Arch Linux: zayn7lie
  • GitHub: zayn7lie

# Papers & Publications

  • (On going) Wang, Z., Shi, W.. Numerical Analysis
  • (Under Review) Wang, Z. Advancing Portfolio Optimization: Hybrid Relaxation and Heuristic Approaches for Cardinality Constrained MIQP Problems.
  • Wang, Z. Enhancing ocular diseases recognition with domain adaptive framework: leveraging domain confusion. Int. J. Mach. Learn. & Cyber. (2024). https://doi.org/10.1007/s13042-024-02358-2
  • Wang, Z. (2022). Emotion Recognition Based on Multi-scale Convolutional Neural Network. In: Tan, Y., Shi, Y. (eds) Data Mining and Big Data. DMBD 2022. Communications in Computer and Information Science, vol 1744. Springer, Singapore. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-981-19-9297-1_12

item.title: Links
item.description:
Note. The Friend Connections section aims at connecting and expanding different open-source communities. I am happy to share links mutually with anyone having created their own posts with high quality. If you want to create friend connections mutually with me, please contact me with Blog Email in About section using following format (Please remove the example comments after completion):

  - title: "Blog Name"
    description: "Blog Description"
    website: "Blog url"
    image: "Blog Image url"

As for my link:

  - title: "zayn_lie's blog"
    description: "Algorithm&Mathematics, Music_Theory&Rhythm_Game, Rationality&Logicism, Peace&Open_Source"
    website: "https://zayn7lie.ber7.org/"
    image: "https://zayn7lie.ber7.org/img/avatar_hu82b799b075fce224917976c46abb1b25_217862_300x0_resize_box_3.png"
